title: The Draymond Green Show - NBA Trade Deadline Reaction + a Darius Garland Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - NBA Trade Deadline Reaction + a Darius Garland Interview
description:
To start episode 12 of ‘The Draymond Green Show’ Draymond discusses Dejounte Murray and LaMelo Ball being named All-Star injury replacements for himself and Kevin Durant. Then he breaks down the Tyrese Haliburton/Domantas Sabonis trade, CJ McCollum to the Pelicans trade, Caris LeVert to the Cavaliers trade, and more about the NBA trade deadline. Then Darius Garland joins the show to discuss his injury-shortened season at Vanderbilt, his mindset playing alongside Collin Sexton, why the Cavaliers have been able to surprise people this season, how the Caris LeVert trade can help the team), mentorship from Rajon Rondo, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
